original_title: Diary-Ahh of a Mad Independent Filmmaker
overview: A behind the scene's look at the struggles of an Independent broken down film maker on tour. Cult film Director Lloyd Kaufman and local Oregon promoter Steve Tenhonen's odyssey through the Northwest. From a crazed theater owner to rabid Troma fans, the characters they encounter are truly mad!
title: Diary-Ahh of a Mad Independent Filmmaker
